resources.string:
\ Yaaic 0.1
\ Yet Another Android IRC Client
\ Sebastian Kaspari
\ http://www.yaaic.org
\ 
\ Yaaic is free and will remain free! If you like Yaaic you can support Yaaic by donating a small amount. :)
